name: Legends of War: Patton's Campaign
description:
Assume the role of General Patton and command the U.S. Third Army, from the beaches of France to the city of Berlin, along a complete Campaign composed of 7 Operations and 35 different Missions of varied and exciting objectives to fight the Nazi forces.

Manage your Army, recruiting troops that range from infantry to armored cars and aircrafts. Lead them in the battlefield to accomplish a great variety of missions, including infiltration, sabotage and many others.

Define your strategy, and become a Legend of War! Now you can be part of WWII History!

¤ Unique combination of RPG and high-level strategic management with turn-based tactics.

¤ Go head-to-head with your friends with the hot-seat multiplayer mode.

¤ Simple and effective control system, especially adapted for rich gameplay on your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system.

¤ Special units, including snipers, commandos, fighters, bombers...

Legends of War, the new saga of the best Strategy & RPG games, now on your PSP system!
